channel.title: Trump on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Trump on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Ask E. Jean’ Review: Trump Accuser E. Jean Carroll Reclaims the Spotlight on Her Own Terms in Flawed but Sympathetic Doc
item.description: Director Ivy Meeropol profiles the journalist and advice columnist who sued the president in 2019, ultimately being awarded $88.3 million in damages by a jury.

item.title: ‘Ask E. Jean’ Review: Trump Accuser E. Jean Carroll Reclaims the Spotlight on Her Own Terms in Flawed but Sympathetic Doc
item.description: Director Ivy Meeropol profiles the journalist and advice columnist who sued the president in 2019, ultimately being awarded $88.3 million in damages by a jury.

item.title: Trump admin issues stop-work order for offshore wind project
item.description: Project was 80 percent complete and was slated to power more than 350,000 homes.

item.title: CBS caved to Trump—now he’s seeking punishments for ABC and NBC
item.description: Trump says ABC and NBC “give me 97% BAD STORIES,” urges FCC to revoke licenses.

item.title: The fight over science funding: Congress vs. the OMB
item.description: The Senate is restoring science funding to normal levels; that may not be enough.

item.title: John Oliver Mocks Trump’s Stroll Atop White House Roof: “The President Just Fully Snoopied on National TV”
item.description: “That may actually be a perfect encapsulation of Trump’s presidency: A bunch of people yelling, ‘What the f*** are you doing?’” the ‘Last Week Tonight’ host quipped after the president caught reporter

item.title: John Oliver Mocks Trump’s Stroll Atop White House Roof: “The President Just Fully Snoopied on National TV”
item.description: “That may actually be a perfect encapsulation of Trump’s presidency: A bunch of people yelling, ‘What the f*** are you doing?’” the ‘Last Week Tonight’ host quipped after the president caught reporter

item.title: New executive order puts all grants under political control
item.description: All new funding on hold until Trump administration can cancel any previously funded grants.

item.title: Jess Glynne Criticizes White House for Using Viral Jet2 Holiday Sound in Deportation Meme: “Makes Me Sick”
item.description: “My music is about love, unity and spreading positivity — never about division or hate,” the British singer said online in response to the White House using audio from her song, “Hold My Hand.”

item.title: Jess Glynne Criticizes White House for Using Viral Jet2 Holiday Sound in Deportation Meme: “Makes Me Sick”
item.description: “My music is about love, unity and spreading positivity — never about division or hate,” the British singer said online in response to the White House using audio from her song, “Hold My Hand.”

item.title: Samantha Bee Laments ‘Late Show’ Cancellation: “It’s Awful”
item.description: In a podcast interview, the comedian says she feels for her former ‘Daily Show’ co-star Stephen Colbert.

item.title: Samantha Bee Laments ‘Late Show’ Cancellation: “It’s Awful”
item.description: In a podcast interview, the comedian says she feels for her former ‘Daily Show’ co-star Stephen Colbert.

item.title: Trump claims Europe won’t make Big Tech pay ISPs; EU says it still might
item.description: EC spokesperson denies network-fee issue is settled, says it must be legislated.

item.title: Trump admin. is muffling CDC’s flagship health journal, report finds
item.description: CDC’s MMWR is publishing much less, and sources say studies now require RFK Jr.’s sign-off.

item.title: Court rules Trump broke US law when he fired Democratic FTC commissioner
item.description: Supreme Court precedent protects FTC commissioner, at least “for the time being.”

item.title: Trump’s claims of a Coca-Cola agreement quickly go flat as nutritionists groan
item.description: Whichever sweetener is used, Coke is still crammed with sugar.

item.title: Trump admin to finally cap price of weird bandages that cost $10 billion last year
item.description: Trump administration has delayed a Biden-era fix twice, but is now set to cap price.

item.title: Federal Judge Temporarily Blocks Trump Administration’s Immigration Raids in Los Angeles
item.description: A federal judge has temporarily blocked the Trump administration from conducting indiscriminate immigration enforcement raids in Los Angeles to detain people based solely on race, ethnicity, language

item.title: Federal Judge Temporarily Blocks Trump Administration’s Immigration Raids in Los Angeles
item.description: A federal judge has temporarily blocked the Trump administration from conducting indiscriminate immigration enforcement raids in Los Angeles to detain people based solely on race, ethnicity, language
